Container.Name: OpenProject
Container.Overview:
OpenProject is a web-based project management system for location-independent team collaboration, this is a release of the open-source community edition. Once the container has started it may take a few minutes before the WebUI is available, see container logs for startup progress.
The default administrator login credentials are: **Username:** `admin` **Password:** `admin`
For advanced configuration, see all supported environment variables: (https://www.openproject.org/docs/installation-and-operations/configuration/environment/#supported-environment-variables)
Container.Changes: ### 2024-05-24 - Moved Docker from community registry to new openproject/openproject. - Updated template to OpenProject 14.1.0, see OpenProject changelog for breaking changes. ### 2023-09-21 - Removed DATABASE_URL variable (when added, even when blank, caused image to always try use external DB) - Adjusted HTTPS variables to now only appear in advanced view. ### 2023-09-17 - Added configurable DATABASE_URL variable under advanced settings. ### 2023-09-14 - Initial release.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: The port to serve the frontend WebUI.

Config.Name: Host Name
Config.Description: This must be equal to your server IP and the WebUI port above. (5683 by default)

Config.Name: Postgres Data Directory
Config.Description: The directory to store all data from the Postgres database running on this container.

Config.Name: Assets Directory
Config.Description: The directory where assets are saved.

Config.Name: Secret Key Base
Config.Description: The secret key used to sign sensitive data, enter a random string here.

Config.Name: Application Title
Config.Description: Change the default application title that appears on the frontend.

Config.Name: Max Attachment Size (MB)
Config.Description: The maximum file size (MB) to allow for attachments.

Config.Name: HSTS Headers
Config.Description: Allow disabling of HSTS headers and HTTP > HTTPS redirects, this should only be enabled if HTTPS is on.

Config.Name: Use HTTPS (SSL)
Config.Description: Whether or not to use HTTPS, if you only plan to only run OpenProject locally then leave this disabled.
